roleset.name: become aware of
roleset.note: NOTICE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'notice' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 30.1. (from notice.01-v predicate notes)
NOTICE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to notice.01-v. VN class see-30.1-1. Framed by Katie. (from notice.01-n)
NOTICING-N, TAKE_NOTICE-L NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: notice-v: more bad poetry
example.text: Air-traffic problems, though often quite grim / This time of year leave us in stitches / When we notice around our airport / A holding pattern for witches.

example.name: notice-v: sentential thing noticed
example.text: Richard Breeden hadn't noticed that his new desk had just four telephone lines and one phone.
example.arg: that his new desk had just four telephone lines and one phone

example.name: notice-v: nominal thing noticed
example.text: The guest paid his bill at the resort hotel, and as he departed he noticed a sign saying, ``Have You Left Anything?''
example.arg: a sign saying, ``Have You Left Anything?''

example.name: notice-v: passivized
example.text: That can be expensive, because [the problem]-1 may not be noticed *trace*-1 for a while, and the sheets are typically thrown away.

example.name: notice-v: rare English pro-drop
example.text: *trace* Didn't feel a thing, but noticed some strange bird behavior.

example.name: notice-v: wh-clause as arg1
example.text: Harry has avoided all that by living in a Long Island suburb with his wife, who's so addicted to soap operas and mystery novels she-1 barely seems *trace*-1 to notice when her husband disappears for drug-seeking forays into Manhattan.
example.arg: when her husband disappears for drug-seeking forays into Manhattan

example.name: notice-v: arg 1
example.text: notice of this wave begining to build
example.arg: of this wave begining to build

example.name: notice-n: arg 0
example.text: this could have escaped the notice of Nebraska coaches

roleset.name: usually written alert as to a coming event
roleset.note: NOTICE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to write.01-v. See VN classes lecture-37.11.1, performance-26.7-2-1, say.37.7, scribble-25.2, transfer_mesg-37.1.1-1-1. Framed by Katie. (from notice.03-n)

role.descr: thing written, subject matter of notice

example.name: notice-n: args 1 and 2
example.text: In announcements to workers late last week, GM effectively signed death notices for two full-sized van assembly plants , andcast serious doubt on the futures of three U.S. car factories.
example.arg: for two full-sized van assembly plants

example.name: notice-n: arg 1 only
example.text: a notice of intent to revoke Drexel's brokerage license
example.arg: of intent to revoke Drexel's brokerage license

example.name: notice-n: with arg 3
example.text: warning notices about the potential threat to exposure
example.arg: about the potential threat to exposure

example.name: give_notice-l
example.text: He gave his two week notice to the company
example.note: Note that "two week" doesn't temporally modify the notice. It modifies the unspoken action of leaving an appointment/position. It is therefore the subject matter of the notice.

roleset.name: able to be noticed
roleset.note: NOTICEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, notice.01. (from noticeable.01-j)

example.name: noticeable-j: arg1
example.text: I have very hairy arms for a girl , not thick hairs like a male s but lots of very noticable , dark and long -LRB- I bleach regularly but it only lasts a day or two before the roots are noticable -RRB-
